title: Watch the new extended trailer for the Ratchet & Clank movie - Movies
text: Those looking forward to the Ratchet & Clank movie can whet their appetite by watching its latest trailer.The newly-released promo focuses on the forthcoming film's galactic setting and its two prime characters, including how Ratchet met Clank.Ratchet & Clank tells the story of the duo as they attempt to stop an alien named Chairman Drek from destroying every planet in the Solana Galaxy. When the two stumble upon a dangerous weapon capable of destroying entire planets, they are tasked with joining forces with a team of colorful heroes called The Galactic Rangers in order to save the galaxy.
